ARCH:

input_layer(IN: 5, OUT: 10) -----> layer_2(IN: 10, OUT:12) -----> layer_3(IN: 22, OUT: 20) ----> output_layer(IN:20 , OUT: 4)
   |                                                                        |
   |                                                                        |
   --------------------------------------------------------------------------


- POSITIVE TEST
c(lin_alg).
c(mlp).

NNWeights = [W1] ++ [W2] ++ [W3] ++ [W4].

MN = mlp:setup(NNWeights).
REQ = {requestInference, self() , [1,2,5,7,8]}.
MN ! REQ.
receive {error,Input,Error} -> Error ; {result,Input, Output} -> Output end.






io:fwrite("Hello world! ~p,~p,~p  ~n", [VS,IDL2,IDL3])
